import React from 'react' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' const Offers = () => { const products = useSelector((state) => state.productsReducer.products) const offers = products.slice(2,10) return (

Hot Offers

{offers[0].title}

{offers[0].price}$

{offers[1].title}

{offers[1].price}$

{offers[4].title}

{offers[4].price}$

) } export default Offers
